message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to meet your needs. This exceptional item carries a significant value to me, and I believe it would be a great addition to your collection. Considering its quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive opportunity to acquire it at a special introductory price of $120. I understand its worth to you might be around $80, but I hope this offer will be appealing. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.
